title: Wow, Kennen still can't kill anything and is even worse in 1v1 scenarios, cool
body:
Is this a fucking joke?

Kennen with Hourglass + Hextech Belt + Needlessly Large Rod 
Zyra with Frost Queen + Locket + Codex

Zyra is going to ward some brush I'm sitting in. As she hits the brush, I hit her with my entire kit. She eats a full ult, shuriken, surge, rush, belt, and still has about 30% health left. Meanwhile, I'm out of cooldowns, so she just roots me and walks away.

This is stupid.
